channel.title: Protest on A Wild Political Nerd
channel.description: Recent content in Protest on A Wild Political Nerd

item.title: "My aim is true, as my eye is the Prophets"
item.description: Same vibe. Which is funny, because the one on the right was designed intentionally to fit the vibe of a dystopia that fetishized both the founders and firearms to prop-up a white nationalist theocracy.
